author: Rumi
quote: Stop acting so small. You are the universe in ecstatic motion.

author: John Muir
quote: The clearest way into the Universe is through a forest wilderness.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: Everything in the universe has a rhythm, everything dances.

author: Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
quote: Everything in the universe is within you. Ask all from yourself.

author: C. JoyBell C.
quote: Last night I lost the world, and gained the universe.

author: E.E. Cummings
quote: listen: there’s a hellof a good universe next door; let’s go

author: Kurt Vonnegut
quote: The universe is a big place, perhaps the biggest.

author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
quote: Music is the universal language of mankind.

author: Shelby Foote
quote: A university is just a group of buildings gathered around a library.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: Nothing happens until something moves.

author: Ray Bradbury
quote: We are an impossibility in an impossible universe.

author: Leonardo da Vinci
quote: The painter has the Universe in his mind and hands.

author: Peter De Vries
quote: Everybody hates me because I'm so universally liked.

author: Muriel Rukeyser
quote: The universe is made of stories, not of atoms.

author: Nathanael West
quote: Numbers constitute the only universal language.

author: Harlan Ellison
quote: The two most common elements in the universe are Hydrogen and stupidity.

author: Lao Tzu
quote: Music in the soul can be heard by the universe.

author: Rumi
quote: You are the universe in ecstatic motion.

author: Richard P. Feynman
quote: I... a universe of atoms, an atom in the universe.

author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
quote: The Universe is under no obligation to make sense to you.

author: Lao Tzu
quote: To a mind that is still the whole universe surrenders.

author: Rumi
quote: Do not feel lonely, the entire universe is inside you.

author: Carl Sagan
quote: The universe seems neither benign nor hostile, merely indifferent.

author: Thomas Pynchon
quote: Why should things be easy to understand?

author: Rumi
quote: Shine like the whole universe is yours.

author: George Orwell
quote: During﻿ times of universal deceit, telling the truth becomes a revolutionary act.

author: Bob Marley
quote: Man is a universe within himself.

author: Madeleine L'Engle
quote: When we lose our myths we lose our place in the universe.

author: Terry Pratchett
quote: So much universe, and so little time.

author: Rumi
quote: The universe and the light of the stars come through me.

author: Winston S. Churchill
quote: You create your own universe as you go along.

author: Steven Moffat
quote: I'd forgotten not all victories are about saving the universe.

author: Tom Robbins
quote: We're making it up. The world, the universe, life, reality. Especially reality.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: Earth is the insane asylum of the universe.

author: Chuang Tzu
quote: To a mind that is still, the entire universe surrenders.

author: Marquis de Sade
quote: All universal moral principles are idle fancies.

author: Timothy Leary
quote: The universe is an intelligence test.

author: Giuseppe Verdi
quote: You may have the universe if I may have Italy

author: Jennifer Elisabeth
quote: If ever I was running, it was towards you.

author: Eckhart Tolle
quote: Nonresistance is the key to the greatest power in the universe.

author: Mel Brooks
quote: Humor is just another defense against theuniverse.

author: Doug Dillon
quote: The stars up there at night are closer than you think.

author: Herman Melville
quote: Beneath those stars is a universe of gliding monsters.

author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
quote: I love the smell of the universe in the morning.

author: William Arthur Ward
quote: A warm smile is the universal language of kindness.

author: Joanna Macy
quote: The heart thatbreaks open can contain the whole universe.

author: Tom Waits
quote: The Universe is making music all the time.

author: A.A. Attanasio
quote: Being human is the most terrible loneliness in the universe.

author: Steven Weinberg
quote: The more the universe seems comprehensible, the more it also seems pointless

author: Sebastyne Young
quote: From where I’m sitting,I AM the centre of the Universe!

author: Pops O'Donnell
quote: a friend with weed is a friend indeed...

author: Steve Jobs
quote: What we're doing here will send a giant ripple through the universe.

author: Democritus
quote: Everything existing in the universe is the fruit of chance and necessity.

author: Goethe
quote: The limits of my language are the limits of my universe.

author: Galileo Galilei
quote: Mathematics is the language in which God has written the universe

author: D.J. MacHale
quote: I was exhausted. Fighting to save the universe will do that.

author: Jean Paul
quote: How alone everyone is in the vast tomb of the universe!

author: Muriel Rukeyser
quote: The universe is made up of stories, not atoms.

author: James Joyce
quote: In the particular is contained the universal.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: My sense of god is my sense of wonder about the universe.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: To endure oneself may be the hardest task in the universe.

author: Frank Herbert
quote: To endure oneself may be the hardest task in the universe.
